column1: And who says this world isn't chock full of sleeping sheep?  That's why these companies are able to milk the sheep dry. If you don't believe it just look at people on black Friday. Talk about the herd mentality....
Awesome!! Makes me work even harder and smarter while learning to code!!!

Eh nope.. all Malls are 30 miles away and I don't buy much stuff online if I can't try it on.
Stuck in 20th century I guess
